mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMARK (#{bookmarkId}, #{userId}, #{bookmarkDatetime}, #{productId}) VALUES ((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(#{bookmarkId}) + 1, 1) FROM BOOKMARK B), #{userId}, #{bookmarkDatetime}, #{productId})
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_IMAGE, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME FROM PRODUCT LEFT JOIN BOOKMARK ON PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID = BOOKMARK.PRODUCT_ID JOIN USER ON BOOKMARK.USER_ID = USER.USER_ID ORDER BY PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME
